forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 8 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 13 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds under a bright, sunny sky, offering a rare clarity that invites both admiration and exploration. With temperatures hovering around the low 60s and a brisk southwest wind sweeping through the streets, the scenery sparkles, accentuating the city’s iconic silhouette against a saffron horizon. Although the sun shines brightly, the wind carries a refreshing chill, hinting at the ocean’s proximity. As the day progresses, the warmth may seem to retreat slightly, as the marine layer starts to stretch its fingers out toward the shoreline, poised to usher in a gentle cooling relief.

Tonight, the clouds will begin to drift in, creating a canvas of partly cloudy skies. The evening will bring with it a soothing coolness, perfect for those wandering along waterfront promenades or enjoying intimate gatherings with friends in cozy cafés. The breeze is destined to remain lively, urging residents and visitors alike to wrap themselves in light layers to fully savor the night without a chill. As the day winds down, consider a leisurely stroll through one of the city’s many parks or perhaps a quiet sit along the waterfront, where the fading sunlight casts a tranquil glow on the tranquil waters of the bay—ideal for those seeking solace in the embrace of nature, even amidst a bustling metropolis.
